item.description:

item.title: 乌克兰扩大无人机袭击，阿联酋航空审查俄罗斯航班
item.description: 在上周末乌克兰无人机深入俄罗斯境内发动袭击之后，世界上最大的长途运输公司计划重新考虑对俄罗斯的服务。【原文：The world’s largest long-haul carrier plans to review services to Russia following Ukrainian drone attacks deep inside the country over the weekend.】

item.title: 亚马逊因市场价格控制遭德国警告
item.description: 德国反垄断监管机构警告亚马逊公司，对其市场上零售商的价格控制很可能违反国家和欧盟法律。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. was warned by Germany’s antitrust watchdog that price controls for retailers on its marketplace are likely to violate national and European Union laws.】

item.title: 印度与俄罗斯支持的经济集团将开始自由贸易谈判
item.description: 一位俄罗斯官员说，印度和莫斯科支持的欧亚经济联盟将于今年开始贸易谈判，而此时这个南亚国家也在寻求与美国和欧盟达成雄心勃勃的贸易协议。【原文：India and the Moscow-backed Eurasian Economic Union will begin trade talks this year, a Russian official said, at a time when the South Asian nation is also pursuing ambitious trade deals with the US and the European Union.】

item.title: 英国前贸易部长将为捷克亿万富翁克里廷斯基提供建议
item.description: 前英国贸易部长格雷格-汉兹（Greg Hands）被任命为丹尼尔-克雷廷斯基（Daniel Kretinsky）的全职顾问，就在这位捷克亿万富翁收购该国陷入困境的皇家邮政服务几周之后。【原文：Former UK trade minister Greg Hands has been appointed full-time adviser to Daniel Kretinsky, just weeks after the Czech billionaire bought the country’s struggling Royal Mail postal service.】

item.title: 快递英雄因 Glovo 卡特尔被欧盟罚款 3.29 亿欧元
item.description: Delivery Hero SE 同意支付总计 3.29 亿欧元（3.76 亿美元），以了结欧盟对其在收购西班牙竞争对手 Glovo 之前与 Glovo 勾结的调查。【原文：Delivery Hero SE agreed to pay a total of €329 million ($376 million) to settle a European Union probe into collusion with Glovo before it sealed a takeover of its Spanish rival.】

item.title: 特斯拉机器人出租车面临关键的测试和推广月
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是我们的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，埃德-鲁德洛（Ed Ludlow）将为您报道埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）加速推进的特斯拉机器人出租车服务计划。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Ed Ludlow checks in on Elon Musk’s accelerating plans for a Tesla robotaxi service.】

item.title: 罗马尼亚向银行注入更多资金，以缩小市场短缺
item.description: 罗马尼亚央行连续第二周向国内银行注入流动性，以进一步平息近期政治动荡期间货币市场波动加剧的局面。【原文：Romania’s central bank injected liquidity into domestic banks for a second week as it sought to further calm money markets after increased volatility during recent political turmoil.】

item.title: 如果特朗普将关税与国际收支危机挂钩，则风险重重
item.description: 各国倾向于避免宣布面临国际收支问题，这是有道理的。这让市场感到不安。它们让人们想起阿根廷、希腊或泰国等地的政策失败。它们让人联想到国际货币基金组织的技术官僚飞来实施紧缩政策。【原文：Countries tend to avoid declaring they’re facing balance-of-payments problems, for good reason. They unnerve markets. They remind people of policy failures in places like Argentina, Greece or Thailand. They conjure up images of IMF technocrats flying in to enforce austerity regimes.】

item.title: 全球大学转向内部，不只是特朗普与哈佛的较量
item.description: 我是马尔科姆-斯科特（Malcolm Scott），驻悉尼的国际经济编辑。今天，Swati Pandey 将探讨留学生市场。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Malcolm Scott, international economics editor in Sydney. Today, Swati Pandey looks at the international student market. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: Chime 控股公司寻求以较低估值进行首次公开募股，筹资 8.32 亿美元
item.description: Chime Financial Inc.及其部分股东正在寻求通过首次公开募股筹集多达 8.32 亿美元的资金，这可能会使这家总部位于旧金山的金融科技公司的估值完全摊薄后达到约 110 亿美元，较其 2021 年的最高估值大幅下降。【原文：Chime Financial Inc. and some of its shareholders are seeking to raise as much as $832 million from an initial public offering, which could give the San Francisco-based fintech a fully diluted valuation of as much as roughly $11 billion, a significant drop from its peak valuation in 2021.】

item.title: 百时美将在癌症交易中向 BioNTech 支付高达 111 亿美元的费用
item.description: 百时美施贵宝公司（Bristol-Myers Squibb Co.【原文：Bristol-Myers Squibb Co. will pay BioNTech SE as much as $11.1 billion to license a next-generation cancer drug, as competition intensifies in an area of oncology that seeks to harness the immune system to attack tumors.】

item.description:

Debt, deficit have DoubleLine, TCW shunning long bonds

item.title: 数据公布前关税不确定性笼罩前景，国债下跌
item.description: 在有关世界最大经济体健康状况的数据繁忙的一周开始之际，唐纳德-特朗普总统关税政策的不确定性继续肆虐，美国资产普遍下挫，国债随之下跌。【原文：Treasuries fell amid a broad selloff of US assets as uncertainty over President Donald Trump’s tariff policy continued to swirl at the start of a busy week for data on the health of the world’s largest economy.】

item.title: 对冲基金皮克顿买入波动性，担心出现新的关税暴动
item.description: 加拿大皮克顿-马霍尼资产管理公司（Picton Mahoney Asset Management）负责人表示，最近几周已经消退的全球市场波动很可能会卷土重来，他的公司正在为此下注。【原文：The head of Canada’s Picton Mahoney Asset Management said the global market volatility that has faded in recent weeks is likely to return, and his firm is betting on it.】

item.title: 法航荷航降低票价刺激跨大西洋需求
item.description: 法航-荷航正在以更低廉的票价刺激对价格敏感的乘客的需求，此前一些乘坐跨大西洋航班等航线经济舱的乘客在预订机票时变得更加犹豫不决。【原文：Air France-KLM is stimulating demand among price-sensitive customers with cheaper fares, after some passengers in coach class on routes like trans-Atlantic flights became more hesitant to book.】

item.title: 泰尔支持的迷幻药制造商 Atai 将与 Beckley 合并
item.description: Atai Life Sciences NV 公司同意收购规模较小的英国竞争对手 Beckley Psytech Ltd. 公司的全部控制权，并筹集了 3000 万美元的新股本，以巩固其作为治疗精神疾病的迷幻药领先制造商之一的地位。【原文：Atai Life Sciences NV agreed to buy full control of smaller UK rival Beckley Psytech Ltd. and raised $30 million in fresh equity, as it seeks to cement its position as one of the leading makers of psychedelic drugs for mental health conditions.】

item.title: 孟加拉国缩小财政赤字，削减预算支出
item.description: 孟加拉国临时政府在其首份预算案中提出了减少财政赤字和降低支出的目标，因为这个南亚国家的目标是满足未来获得国际货币基金组织贷款的条件，这对遭受危机重创的经济至关重要。【原文：Bangladesh’s interim government targeted a smaller fiscal deficit and lower spending in its maiden budget, as the South Asian nation aims to meet conditions for future International Monetary Fund loans, critical for the crisis-hit economy.】

item.title: 摩根大通策略师警告美股上涨面临滞胀风险
item.description: 摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Higher prices and weaker US economic growth over the summer are likely to threaten the S&P 500’s rally, according to JPMorgan Chase & Co. strategists.】

item.title: 卡尼旨在通过释放内部贸易来挫败特朗普的关税攻势
item.description: 加拿大总理马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）正在推动美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收关税，迫使加拿大各省之间实现贸易自由化，从而抵消美国总统特朗普征收关税给经济带来的痛苦。【原文：Prime Minister Mark Carney is pushing to offset the economic pain caused by US President Donald Trump’s tariffs by compelling Canadian provinces to liberalize trade with one another.】

item.title: 买家罢工冲击美国长债，DoubleLine 和 Pimco 避而远之
item.description: 对于 DoubleLine Capital 来说，在 30 年期美国国债问题上有两种方法可供选择：要么尽量回避，要么直接做空。【原文：For DoubleLine Capital, there are two approaches to consider when it comes to 30-year US Treasuries: either avoid them, to the degree they can, or outright short them.】

item.title: 印度寻求国营企业更多更频繁地分红
item.description: 据知情人士透露，印度政府正要求国营公司在本财年将股息支付额提高约 25%，因为这个亚洲第三大经济体正寻求在动荡的全球环境中加强财政。【原文：The Indian government is asking state-run companies to increase dividend payouts by about 25% this financial year as Asia’s third-largest economy seeks to bolster finances in a volatile global environment, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 分析师的看涨评论掩盖了美股上涨的疲软信念
item.description: 根据 Jefferies LLC 的分析，在经历了 5 月份的疯狂反弹后，华尔街分析师目前对 S&P 500 指数中单个公司的买入评级超过了 20 多年来的任何时候。【原文：After a furious May rally, Wall Street analysts now have more buy ratings on individual companies in the S&P 500 Index than at any time in more than two decades, according to a Jefferies LLC analysis.】

item.title: 英国将增加开支，欧洲国防股再创新高
item.description: 周一，由于英国公布了扩充潜艇舰队和加强核威慑力量的计划，欧洲高涨的国防类股再次获得提振。【原文：Europe’s high-flying defense stocks got another boost on Monday as the UK unveiled plans to expand its submarine fleet and shore up its nuclear deterrent.】

item.title: 印尼贸易顺差缩小，全球关税担忧促进从中国的进口
item.description: 有迹象表明，进口商正在囤积来自中国和其他主要贸易伙伴的商品，以减轻全球关税上涨带来的风险，印尼因此出现了五年多来最小的贸易顺差。【原文：Indonesia posted its smallest trade surplus in more than five years on signs importers are stocking up on goods from China and other key trading partners to mitigate the risks of rising global tariffs.】

item.title: 日本将在 2030 年前寻求 8400 亿美元的外来投资
item.description: 日本计划到 2030 年将引进外国直接投资的目标提高到 120 万亿日元（约合 8400 亿美元），旨在吸引更多的海外资本，帮助重振陷入困境的地区经济，解决劳动力短缺问题。【原文：Japan plans to raise its incoming foreign direct investment target to ¥120 trillion ($840 billion) by 2030, aiming to attract more overseas capital to help revitalize struggling regional economies and address labor shortages.】

item.title: 南非农产品出口激增 10%，美国出货量攀升
item.description: 一家行业机构称，由于港口业绩改善和对美国的货运量攀升，第一季度南非农产品出口同比增长 10%，达到 33.6 亿美元。【原文：South African agricultural exports rose 10% in the first quarter to $3.36 billion from a year earlier as port performance improved and shipments to the US climbed, an industry body said.】

item.title: 美英关税协议达成后英国工厂 "迎来转机
item.description: 一项受到密切关注的调查显示，在基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）和唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）政府就降低部分美国关税达成有限协议后，英国工厂在 5 月份出现了 "转机 "迹象。【原文：British factories showed signs of “turning a corner” in May following a limited deal between Keir Starmer and Donald Trump’s governments to lower some US tariffs, a closely watched survey showed.】

item.title: 私募股权投资回报减少，高管寻求安抚焦躁的投资者
item.description:
随着收购高管们齐聚柏林参加一年一度的盛会，一些人开始谈论这个曾经占据主导地位的行业正在成为一个利基资产类别。【原文：

As buyout executives gather for their yearly jamboree in Berlin, some are talking about the once dominant industry becoming a niche asset class. 

】
